notes.text:
It's just Ninjas. Started using it in Legend after getting out of pltinum with 3sd Hazy.  Screwed around a lot in platinum testing various decks at the start of the season so I didn't hit Kog till 112 wins. Hazy ran through Plat once I decided to actually start climbing.

 Originally had a 3/2 split of Transformation and Art Notebook but it felt off so I swapped to a 2/3 split and it felt more consistent. Climb was straight forward after that. Fell out of Leg3 once due to a missplay-connection issue-brick string that tilted me pretty hard. 

Rip 3sd
